What is the purpose of the OPTION_NFT_TOKEN option, which allows for the creation of multiple satoshi NFT tokens?
The OPTION_NFT_TOKEN option is actually used to create a single satoshi NFT token, not multiple satoshi NFT tokens. This token tokenizes control over the root ID.

ill publish prices
OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER = 1024  // when not set on a gateway, top level ID and currency registration happen on launch chain
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN = 2048        // single satoshi NFT token, tokenizes control over the root ID
```
When the OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER option is set on a gateway, top-level ID and currency registration happen on the launch chain. Is that correct?
No, that's not correct. When the OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER option is **not** set on a gateway, top-level ID and currency registration happen on the launch chain.

ill publish prices
OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER = 1024  // when not set on a gateway, top level ID and currency registration happen on launch chain
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN = 2048        // single satoshi NFT token, tokenizes control over the root ID
```
